revised_title: Deep Sea Rhizopodal Fauna: Lituolida and Foraminifera
tldr: The author examines the Rhizopodal Fauna of the Deep Sea, focusing on the Lituolida family of Foraminifera. They discover new generic types and varieties of these organisms, which are found at great depths in the ocean. The author also discusses the relationship between the size of these organisms and their habitat's temperature, as well as the reproductive processes of Foraminifera.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Marine Ecology
